name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Default Predefined Comment Replies Templates

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for default prefilled comments and replies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of writing the same reply tens, hundreds, thousands of times to the comments on your channel? This simple extension allows for a definition of a custom predefined reply that is automatically filled in the YouTube Studio in the comments section after clicking the reply button. It works similarly to standard form autofill. The default response can be edited in the extension popup.
